title: 03/24/2021 - HOUR 1 - Packers, Bucs, Zion
itunes:title: 03/24/2021 - HOUR 1 - Packers, Bucs, Zion
description:
The Packers reason for not surrounding Aaron Rodgers with better players

The Bucs have the right formula to help Tom Brady

Now that LeBron is hurt, Zion is the face of the league


Guest: Nick Wright
